name: Tummy Slide
description:
It's sliding time! Join the penguins in the world of Tummy Slide. Collect gems, pick up power-ups & unlock all the amazing penguins in the first ever Tummy Sliding game.

Tummy Slide your way through 24 fun levels set in 3 different worlds. Unlock new penguins and explore all their magical trails. This game is nothing but pure joy!

What are you waiting for, go join the tummy crew and start sliding!

FEATURES:
• 3 Worlds to tummy slide in
• 24 levels to master
• Select between 11 penguins
• Unlock all 19 magic trails
• Lot’s of fun power-ups
• AMAZING graphics
• Simple controls
